locked.description: Whether the configuration is not allowed to be overriden or extended.

line_width.description: The width of a line the printer will try to stay under. Note that the printer may exceed this width in certain cases.

indent_width.description: The number of characters for an indent.

new_line_kind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).
